wikipedia_page.main: Charles Frank Byers, Baron Byers,  (24 July 1915 – 6 February 1984) was a British Liberal Party politician who later became a life peer and Privy Councillor.

response: **Frank Byers, Baron Byers (1915–1984), MP 1945–1950 and life peer. Son of Charles.
